mapper.select:
select b.donation_board_id, donation_board_title, donation_board_contents, u.user_nickname, donation_board_register_date, count(r.reply_id) reply_count from tbl_donation_board b join tbl_reply r on b.donation_board_id = r.donation_board_id join tbl_user u on b.user_id = u.user_id
group by r.donation_board_id order by donation_board_id desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}

select b.donation_board_id , b.donation_board_title , b.donation_board_contents , f.file_system_name from tbl_donation_board b join tbl_donation_file f on b.donation_board_id = f.donation_board_id and b.donation_board_id = #{donationBoardId}

select b.promotion_board_id , u.user_nickname , b.promotion_board_title , b.promotion_board_contents , b.promotion_board_register_date from tbl_user u join tbl_promotion_board b on u.user_id = b.user_id
order by b.promotion_board_id desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}

select b.promotion_board_id , b.promotion_board_title , b.promotion_board_contents , f.file_system_name from tbl_promotion_board b join tbl_promotion_file f on b.promotion_board_id = f.promotion_board_id and b.promotion_board_id = #{promotionBoardId}
